data.title: Sacred Heart Catholic School - El Reno
data.text:
Sacred Heart, El Reno, used their grant money to purchase a robotics classroom bundle, competition cart, robotics cart and funds to provide a mentor on building robots.

The robotics program provides and excellent, hands-on program to introduce students to STEM projects in an group atmosphere. The program has also allowed the school to start a robotics competition.

"Our middle school students have enjoyed our exciting that was added to their school week. Team building, problem solving, and thoughtful reasoning are used in a self-paced, peaceful environment."
